In what was pretty obvious to those who actually understand this little thing called the Constitution, SCOTUS has ruled that parents have the right to excuse their children from school lessons that may conflict with their religious beliefs. And yes, this includes anything related to the rainbow mob.

Trump praised this decision, calling it a “Tremendous Victory for Parents.”


.@POTUS: "I think the ruling was a great ruling, and I think it's a great ruling for parents... they lost control o
title: Donald Trump takes victory lap over "tremendous" SOCTUS ruling protecting kids from woke school indoctrination

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

While no one should be stunned that New York City voters elected self-proclaimed socialist Zohran Mamdani, it doesn’t make the outcome any less disappointing. The city has seen its fair share of both decent and disastrous mayors over the years, but it feels like this guy might just take the cake—and he hasn’t even taken office yet.

New York City is about to be represented by a man who believes that too many crimes are labeled as violent, so much so that he’s argued violence is an 'artificial construct,' and that it’s actually the district attorneys enforcing the law who are the truly violent ones.
title: Incoming socialist mayor claims violence is "artifical," has insane plans for jails as a result

author: Brodigan
description:

Here are some of the latest illegals the Left is trying to push on us. Zohran Mamdani is the Democrat candidate for New York City mayor. author: Brodigan
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

Saquon Barkley had a decent 2024. I know I'm supposed to hate him because he left The Giants for arch rivals The Eagles (even though I'm a Bills fan, aka the only actual New York team), but it's hard to hate on success when the person finding it, by all accounts, seems like a really good dude. Does any of this have to do with him finding Christianity? Saquon will tell you all of it does.

The rapper opened up while playing a few holes with popular golf YouTuber Grant Horvat.

Super Bowl Champ, Saquon Barkley & one of the biggest golf YouTubers, Grant Horvat talk about faith in Jesus Christ & how B
title: Trump-loving Super Bowl champ opens up about discovering Jesus Christ, credits Him for his most successful season yet

The phrase "our boys in bombers" refers to U.S. military pilots who operate bomber planes. It actually has nothing to do with gender, which is why it’s even more ridiculous that a reporter tried to corner Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth for using that phrase.

It’s the left that constantly obsesses over gender and insignificant birth traits, which makes it all the more frustrating when they try to point fingers and blame the other side.

Q: "Why didn't you acknowledge the female pilots? The messages you sent out only congratulated the boys."

HEGSETH: "’Our boys in bombers’ is a common p
title: Pete Hegseth laughs in the face of a reporter yakking at him for ignoring women with his "boys in bombers" comment

description:

Many men wish tax hikes on successful people. Rapper slash entrepreneur 50 Cent is not happy about it, especially since incoming NYC Mayor The Zohran is targeting him specifically. Not only is the rapper willing to pay for The Zohran to move anywhere else and raise taxes there, but he's about ready to snitch to Donald Trump as well.

It started earlier this month, when The Zohran appeared on "The Breakfast Club" to share some of his batsh*t crazy ideas that've failed in every city they've been attempted in. title: Zohran Mamdani puts 50 Cent's name in his mouth in an attack on successful people, the rapper fires back: "I'm telling Trump"
